Summary: [Question]Unused Type configuration in `app/code/Magento/Translation/etc/di.xml`
Custom field (Release Note): The system now removes unused dependencies in the configuration, enhancing the overall code cleanliness and efficiency. Previously, there were unused dependencies in the configuration which were not contributing to any functionality.

Summary: [Issue] Inconsistent labels for attributes in marketing rules
Custom field (Release Note): The system now correctly populate the labels consistently for category and attribute options in cart price rule

Summary: JoinProcessor caching issue
Custom field (Release Note): The system now correctly applies the JoinProcessor for each iteration, even with consecutive calls, ensuring accurate data retrieval. Previously, the JoinProcessor was incorrectly marked as already applied in consecutive iterations, leading to errors in data retrieval.

Summary: Magento 2 login inside the checkout with existing customer give console error in Firefox browser
Custom field (Release Note): The system now allows users to log in during the checkout process without encountering any console errors in the Firefox browser. Previously, attempting to log in as an existing customer during checkout would result in a console error in Firefox.

Summary: middlename('s) not saved for guest accounts
Custom field (Release Note): The system now correctly saves the middle name for guest accounts during checkout, making it accessible in the email template. Previously, the middle name was not saved in the quote table and was not accessible in the email template for guest accounts.

Summary: [Issue] Update js.js DOM text reinterpreted as HTML
Custom field (Release Note): By using innerText, it will avoid the risk of HTML injection, as these properties automatically escape any HTML special characters in the provided text. This fix, helps prevent cross-site scripting (XSS) vulnerabilities by treating the input as plain text rather than interpreted HTML.

Summary: Hidden dropdown in grids with select action (e.g. Content > Elements > Pages)
Custom field (Release Note): Now the system has been fixed all similar dropdown for all the grids.

Summary: [Issue] add isMultipleFiles property to image form element template
Custom field (Release Note): This fix, prevents the "Browse to find or drag image here" button to disappear when an image is added in a multiple files image form element.

Summary: [Issue] Correct spelling of variables for customer address
Custom field (Release Note): The system now correctly spells variables for customer addresses, ensuring accurate display in the account area of the front end. Previously, incorrect spelling of these variables could lead to errors during local code reviews.

Summary: [Issue] Feature/php8.1 constructor property promotion wee graph ql
Custom field (Release Note): Replace allmost all properties with constructor property promotion in module wee graph ql:

Summary: Credit Card(Payflow Link) payment is not working
Custom field (Release Note): Earlier Getting error (Payment got Declined) while placing order with Credit Card after the fix Order placed successfully.

Summary: [Issue] Product layout based on attribute_set
Custom field (Release Note): The system now allows the adjustment of product layout based on the attribute set, providing a more practical and efficient way to manage product display in the frontend store. Previously, the layout could only be adjusted by SKU or by product types, which was not always practical for many products or specific articles.

Summary: B2B Login as Customer header still has Magento branding
Custom field (Release Note): Earlier the storefront header shows "You are now connected as <customer name> on <store name>" with Magento branding. Which is now fixed and the header shows with ADOBE branding.

Summary: Papal payflow Credit card details saved for later use are not showing up on stored payment method page
Custom field (Release Note): Earlier Papal payflow Credit card details saved for later use was not showing up on stored payment method page which is now fixed credit card details are showing up on stored payment method page.

Summary: [Database Compare] Fatal error if database contains record about Target Rule without conditions
Custom field (Release Note): Earlier if Database contains record about the target rule without any condition was getting fatal errors but after the fix Database comparison tool passes successfully without fatal errors.

Summary: Magento\Framework\Filesystem\Driver\Http depends on reason phrase OK
Custom field (Release Note): Removed "OK" phrase check from Magento\Framework\Filesystem\Driver\Http::isExists

Summary: Customer Grid indexer does not work properly in Update by Schedule mode
Custom field (Release Note): Earlier Customer grid was updated instantly but after the fix Customer grid is updated after cron run but not reflect instantly.

Summary: Reorder with a deleted parent configurable product
Custom field (Release Note): Now while reordering with the deleted product the system will not show the reorder button to reorder

Summary: Gift registry Product isn't displaying properly
Fix static tests to enable usage by 3d-party extensions
There is no red asterisk for mandatory phone number field
Custom field (Release Note): Earlier red asterisk was not showing for phone number but  phone number was mandatory. Which is now fixed red asterisk can be seen on phone number as a mandatory filed.

Summary: Unable to create shipment for order item with multiple sources and corrupted SKU
Custom field (Release Note): Earlier when spaces  was mistakenly added  in sku  through database leads to error in shipment page which is now fixed and automatic trim is considered as human friendly error and no impact was found .Therefore shipment was successfully created.

Summary: [Issue] Fix bad \Magento\Sales\Model\Order\Email\Container\Template::$id property
Custom field (Release Note): This fixes the bad phpdoc for \Magento\Sales\Model\Order\Email\Container\Template::$id, actually $id is type int but in reality is string.

Summary: PHP 8.4 Deprecation Errors Causing Build Failures in 2.4-develop
Special characters in category url_key (when created via REST API)
Custom field (Release Note): Earlier In category_url_key special character is not there after the fix it  is showing special character in category_url_key

Summary: Order get(Shipments|Creditmemos|Invoice)Collection - Collection should not be loaded
Custom field (Release Note): The system now ensures that the collections for shipments and credit memos are not pre-loaded when retrieved from an order, allowing for additional filters or orders to be applied to these collections. Previously, these collections were automatically loaded, preventing any further modifications.

Summary: [Internal] Fixture apply failure is not shown during execution or in logs
Magento admin URL routing wrong detection and CORS errors
Custom field (Release Note): After the fix, if the custom admin domain is a subdomain of the main domain, the admin is accessible only from the configured subdomain.

Summary: Incorrect url_rewrite entries creation with multiple stores in one store group
Custom field (Release Note): Prior to the fix, you could only generate URL rewrites on a website level when editing a product. With the fix, a new setting was introduced (Stores > Configuration > Catalog > Catalog > Search Engine Optimization, "Product URL Rewrite Scope" with options "Store view", "Website") that allows you to generate URL rewrites at the store view or website level.

Summary: Cart persistence is not being respected upon logout
Custom field (Release Note): Added missing functionality Remember Me from customer login to authentication popup and checkout sign ins.

Summary: Pagebuilder's template preview failure for large content
Custom field (Release Note): Large content was leading to canvas element overflowing the browser's limits, and returning incorrect value, which broke backend code (cannot properly decode the image). Fixed with limiting canvas size to the universal browser's limit.

Summary: Duplicated URL key error message generated when importing a product is not correct when the URL Key already belongs to a category
Custom field (Release Note): Displaying the correct error message during product import check, when customer tried to import product when product's url key already belongs to a category.

Summary: Order items are not visible in credit memo emails for the API POST V1/order/:orderId/refund
Custom field (Release Note): Previously, before this fix, when a customer creates a credit memo from an API request notifying send_email, it does not contain the product details grid. After this fix apply the customer sends a credit memo API request, and will find the product item details appearing in the email.

Summary: Issue with Bundle Product + MSI in Clean M2.4.7-p3
Custom field (Release Note): Previously, for inventory bundle products after duplication with the same simple product, the simple product can not be saved. After this fix is applied, the simple product can be saved successfully without any exceptions.

Summary: [CLOUD] Shipping calculation is not considering the shopping cart rule
Custom field (Release Note): Prior to the fix, a cart rule with region condition was not being applied consistently. After the fix, cart rules with region conditions are being applied properly.

Summary: TinyMCE 7 editor font size in the admin in PT and not PX please clarify
Custom field (Release Note): Prior to the fix you could not specify font size in px in WYSIWYG areas. Now you can set the font size in px instead of pt.

Summary: Product Content Type in Page Builder Gets Collapsed Without Correct Messages
Custom field (Release Note): Prior to the fix the preview html was not being generated properly when there were no products in the widget. Now, the empty response is properly generated and products widget is being displayed fine in preview.

Summary: Cart rule sku condition is failing for invoice.
Custom field (Release Note): Discount on Bundle product with dynamic price is now correctly reflected in the invoice. Previously, the discount was not reflected on the invoice.

Summary: [Cloud] Problems with Graphql API
Custom field (Release Note): Before the fix by using Graphql application server, customer address request did not return the most recent data.

Summary: When a gift registry item is purchased, the customer sees items not on their registry
Custom field (Release Note): Gift registry update no longer includes items that do not belong to the gift registry.

Summary: VAPT: Business Logic Error - future date as customer date of birth
Custom field (Release Note): Customer's date of birth can not be set later than today

Summary: Automatic enabling of new ACL permissions
Custom field (Release Note): New permissions added to custom modules will no longer automatically grant access to all existing user roles unless explicitly configured.

Summary: Disabled product still appears in related, upsell, crosssell items in grpahQL query
Custom field (Release Note): Graphql now provide correct response for disabled relared, upsell and cross-sell products

Summary: Admin Actions Log User Report doesnt show details for adminhtml_user_delete
Custom field (Release Note): The adminhtml_user_delete now correctly logs important details. Previously, logs were not generated for user deletions.

Summary: [Cloud] Issue with "Remove All" Confirmation Popup Removing Cart Items Without Confirmation
Custom field (Release Note): Now, clicking the "Remove All" button for attention-required products prompts a confirmation popup to ensure items are only removed with your confirmation. Previously, items were removed immediately without any confirmation

Summary: [CLOUD] Special price not showing in Configurable product
Custom field (Release Note): After the fix, changing the "Used in Product Listing" value for the special price attribute will not affect showing the special price for configurable products.

Summary: Items are duplicated after we create an order from Admin on - Mozilla Firefox browser
Custom field (Release Note): Products added using "Add Products by SKU" are no longer duplicated in Firefox when creating an order in admin.

Summary: [Cloud] Import Processes Interfering with Each Other
Custom field (Release Note): Correct messages are shown if the same admin user performs two or more import operations using the same user session.

Summary: Sitemap Generation Warnings
Custom field (Release Note): After the fix, the sitemap is generated in the system tmp directory and copied to the final destination.

Summary: Performance Issue in Stock Quantity Retrieval for Grouped Products with Multiple Sources
Custom field (Release Note): Grouped product and bundle product edit page is now optimized when assigned products have large number of inventory sources.

Summary: [page builder]Adding Product Listing to block results in errors
Custom field (Release Note): Now adding Bundle Product Listing to block via page builder doesn't results in errors

Summary: Cart Rule with shipping condition not applying when placing order from admin
Custom field (Release Note): Previously, if the cart price rule has a shipping method discount with the coupon, it can not be applied through Admin UI. After this fix is applied, the cart price rule discount with a coupon for a specific shipping method will be applied from Admin UI successfully.

Summary: Corresponding cache key entries are not available in cache tags, hence cache cleaning does not work correctly
Custom field (Release Note): LUA mode is now enabled by default for Redis cache garbage collector to prevent race conditions

Summary: "Something went wrong" error on checkout for inactive company
Custom field (Release Note): Prior to the fix, the logout action was not being completed properly on the cart page, if the longged in user company was no longer enabled. Now, if the company is no longer available, the logout is performed properly.

Summary: [FRESH] HEX code is not updating correctly in SWATCH
Custom field (Release Note): HEX code that is manually entered by user in the Visual Swatch color picker is no longer altered by the system. Previously, certain HEX codes experienced slight adjustments due to conversion errors between color models.

Summary: Customer Segment edition fails with daterange
Custom field (Release Note): It is possible to save customer segment with date range condition, when only one of dates was edited.

Summary: No error message displayed for our of stock products when bulk adding from requisition list
Custom field (Release Note): Prior to the fix a success message was being displayed regardless of the number of products that failed to be added to the cart. Now, separate messages are being displayed for products there were successfully added to the cart and for products that failed.

Summary: [CLOUD] Re-order button functionality
Custom field (Release Note): Re-orderind an order from the administrator area will now add products with stock to the quote even though there are some products in the original order that do not have stock anymore. Prior to the fix no products were being added to the new quote if product with no stock were in the original order.

Summary: Search stores are not working by zip code
Custom field (Release Note): Searching pickup locations by zip code was not working properly for Dutch localisations. After the fix, the pickup location search will provide results based on zip code.

Summary: Issue with SKU Updates after Scheduled Updates Causing Incorrect Product Permissions (-2 Deny)
Custom field (Release Note): Modifying a product's SKU with past scheduled updates no longer causes the product to be inaccessible to the shared catalog customers entitled to see the product.

Summary: Adobe Commerce 2.4.7-p3 unit tests are failing
Custom field (Release Note): No release notes are required.

Summary: Refix https://jira.corp.adobe.com/browse/ACP2E-3389
Custom field (Release Note): Improved performance of admin category page in case of large number of anchor categories

Summary: [CLOUD]: GraphQl error Internal server error placeOrder mutation
Custom field (Release Note): The "placeOrder" mutation with coupon code information in the request is no longer throwing an internal error exception, the order was placed successfully. Previously, it failed with "Internal server error".

Summary: Incorrect canonical URL for category when page > 1
Custom field (Release Note): Previously, the canonical URL for multi-page content did not function correctly, consistently displaying the base URL. However, after the fix was implemented, the canonical URL for multi-page content now correctly displays the URL with the page ID.

Summary: MAGENTO_DC_INDEXER__USE_APPLICATION_LOCK value is ignored
Custom field (Release Note): After the fix, an ENV variable set to "false" will be treated as bool false, not as string 'false'.

Summary: [Braintree] Refund online storing transaction as transactionid-refund
[Braintree] + [CLOUD] Braintree (credit card) orders unable to split the charges
[Braintree] [Cloud]Braintree SSL Certificate expire by June 30
Product attribute > trademark short form ™ is returned as ™
Custom field (Release Note): Resolved character encoding issue with the product name for the GraphQL API

Summary: updateCustomerEmail mutation issue
Custom field (Release Note): Resolved an issue with the updateCustomerEmail mutation where customers without required custom attributes (added after account creation) were unable to update their email.

Summary: GQL - itemsV2 > Original row total, price range prices is returned as $0.00 for downloadable product with file options which has separate prices.
Custom field (Release Note): Resolved an issue where downloadable products with separate link purchase options enabled were returning $0 for itemsV2 > Original row total, price range returned as $0.00 for products with file options having separate prices.

Summary: Mutation setShippingAddressesOnCart throws error when using pickup_location_code
Custom field (Release Note): Fixed an issue where the setShippingAddressesOnCart mutation returned an error when using pickup_location_code without specifying customer_address_id or address. The mutation now correctly allows setting a shipping address with just the pickup_location_code.

Summary: CustomerOrder.items_eligible_for_return list must be consistent with order items
Custom field (Release Note):
Resolved inconsistencies with return eligibility in orders:
	1.	The CustomerOrder.items_eligible_for_return list is now consistent with actual order items.
	2.	The OrderItemInterface.eligible_for_return field correctly returns false when the full quantity has already been returned.
	3.	CustomerOrder.items_eligible_for_return now includes only items that are not already in the process of being returned.

Summary: Add quantity_return_requested field
Custom field (Release Note): Added the quantity_return_requested field to the OrderItemInterface, allowing you to identify the quantity of items for which a return has been submitted. This enhances return tracking alongside the existing quantity_returned field.

Summary: Order available actions must not contain RETURN after returns created for all items in full quantity
Custom field (Release Note): Fixed an issue where the available_actions field in the GraphQL customer.orders query incorrectly included RETURN after a full return was created for all items. The RETURN action is now properly removed once the return process is completed.

Summary: Storefront Compatibility - Update logic to get table name with prefix and other minor improvements
Custom field (Release Note): Updated logic to retrieve the table name with the prefix (related to SCP changes).

Summary: save in address book does not work when using setBillingAddressOnCart GQL's same_as_shipping field
Custom field (Release Note): Fixed an issue where the shipping address was not saved to the customer’s address book when using the setBillingAddressOnCart GraphQL mutation with the same_as_shipping field set to true. Now, the shipping address is correctly stored as expected.

Summary: Standarize the order_id in mutations
Custom field (Release Note): Standardized the order_id input in mutations and updated the order cancel confirmation email template to expose increment id instead of order id.

Summary: CustomerOrder is not displaying the order comments
Custom field (Release Note): Resolved an issue with CustomerOrder to include order comments in guest and customer order GraphQL queries.

Summary: original_item_price must not include any discount
Custom field (Release Note): Updated the logic for original_item_price in GraphQL Cart Item prices to exclude discounts.

Summary: Bundle products still shows "IN_STOCK" when one of its bundled product out of stock
Custom field (Release Note): Resolved an issue where product.stock_status for bundle products still showed "IN_STOCK" even when one of the bundled items was out of stock.

Summary: customer query returns Internal Server Error if value for deleted custom attribute exists for a customer
Custom field (Release Note): Fixed the issue where the customer query returned an internal server error when a deleted custom attribute still had a stored value. Now, a proper error message is returned if a non-existing attribute is requested. Necessary cache is invalidated upon deleing customer custom attribute.

Summary: Action parameter for return and cancel confirmation links
Custom field (Release Note): Action parameter added for return and cancel confirmation email related links

Summary: Guest user confirmation url is redirected to order status page as it is missing orderRef (For GuestRMA)
Custom field (Release Note): Added orderRef parameter to the link in guest RMA confirmation email

Summary: Guest user confirmation url is redirected to order status page as it is missing orderRef
Custom field (Release Note): Added orderRef parameter to the link in guest order cancellation confirmation email

Summary: Issues with customer query when RMA disabled
Custom field (Release Note): Updated the GraphQL logic to ensure that previously created returns remain accessible even when RMA is disabled globally. The error message has been removed to improve the storefront UX, ensuring customers can still view their past returns.

Summary: GraphQL not returning updated cart data when conflicting coupons applied
Custom field (Release Note): Fixed an issue where applying a conflicting coupon with a higher priority resulted in an error message without returning the updated cart data. Now, when a new coupon invalidates the existing one, the mutation correctly returns the cart with the valid coupon applied.

Summary: Cannot return null for non-nullable field "TaxItem.title" on placeOrder GQL
Custom field (Release Note): Fixed an issue where the placeOrder mutation failed with an internal server error due to a null value for the non-nullable field TaxItem.title. Now, the field always returns a valid value, ensuring successful order placement.

Summary: EstimateTotals: Discounts is null for virtual product types
Custom field (Release Note): Resolved the issue with the estimateTotals mutation returning null for discounts when a discount code is applied to a cart containing virtual products.

Summary: Bundle product does not return the correct discount percentage and amount
Custom field (Release Note): New properties "catalog_discount" and "row_catalog_discount" have been introduced for catalog item prices to display the correct discount amounts and percentages at both the row and single item levels.

Summary: Schema of a table when is created brand new different than when upgrading
Custom field (Release Note): Resolved an issue where adding a new VARCHAR column to an existing table caused test failures due to schema differences between fresh installations and upgrades. The modifyColumn() method now correctly handles VARCHAR columns by setting the default charset and collation.

Summary: Gift message configuration on product level
Custom field (Release Note): Fixed an issue where gift messages were not applied at the product level when globally disabled. Now, if gift messages are enabled for a specific product, they can be successfully added using the updateCartItems mutation and will be correctly saved and reflected.

Summary: Issue with removing gift wrapping from cart item
Custom field (Release Note): Fixed the issue where removing gift wrapping from a cart item using the updateCartItems mutation did not work as expected. Now, both applying and removing gift wrapping function correctly without errors.

Summary: The matched registered customer feature is not working in Boilerplate, and the trackViewedProduct mutation needs to be enabled for guests.
Custom field (Release Note): Exposed trackViewedProduct mutation to track product view event for customer and guests

Summary: cart.rules query return error instead of empty array in case no active cart rules are applied
Custom field (Release Note): Fixed the cart.rules query to return an empty array instead of an error when no active cart rules are applied.

Summary: Issue retrieving gift wrappings for cart items
Custom field (Release Note): Updated retrieval logic to return gift wrapping options for cart items when globally disabled but enabled at the product level

Summary: GraphQl Compatibility for PHP-8.4 Version
Custom field (Release Note): Fixed GraphQL compatibility issues with PHP 8.4 across multiple resolvers, ensuring smooth functionality. Updated affected files in CatalogRule, Customer, GiftMessage, GiftCard, and GiftWrapping modules.

Summary: GraphQL calls with OPTIONS method are returning 500 response code when adobe-commerce/storefront-compatibility package installed
Custom field (Release Note): Fixed an issue where GraphQL calls using the OPTIONS method returned a 500 Internal Server Error when the adobe-commerce/storefront-compatibility package was installed. The endpoint now correctly returns a 200/204 response as expected.
